content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello James, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it for a period of time. What rental price are you willing to pay for this property?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 850 Euros per month, but I am open to negotiations. What do you think about my offer?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your offer, James. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand that you are looking to pay a competitive rental price, I must admit that I am looking to maximize my gains. I am hoping that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Considering the size and location of the apartment, I was expecting to receive a higher rental price. I would be willing to consider your offer, but I am hoping that we can come to a higher price that better reflects the value of the property.

Is there any flexibility in your budget, James? Or are you unable to go above 850 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can go up to 900 Euros per month, but that is the maximum I can afford. I am open to negotiations, but I am not willing to go below 850 Euros per month.

I would also like to ask you a few questions about the apartment, such as the utilities and the maintenance fees.

Thank you for your time.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your response, James. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your flexibility in your budget.

Regarding the utilities and maintenance fees, I would be happy to provide you with more information about those. However, I must emphasize that the rental price I am looking for is separate from the utilities and maintenance fees. I am looking to maximize my gains on the rental price alone.

That being said, I am still open to discussing a higher rental price that reflects the value of the property. If you are willing to pay more than 900 Euros per month, that would be great. However, if not, we can discuss other options that may be mutually beneficial.

Let me know if you have any further questions or concerns, James.
name: Heinrich Heine
